actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the authorization for the Fort Scott National Historical Site.

summary.text: Increases the maximum amount authorized to be appropriated for acquisition, development, and rehabilitation of sites of specified events which occurred in Kansas during the decade prior to and during the Civil War.

titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization for the Fort Scott National Historical Site.
